quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
When a woman is talking to you, listen to what she says with her eyes.
Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself.
The opposite of talking isn't listening. The opposite of talking is waiting.
Talking isn't doing. It is a kind of good deed to say well; and yet words are not deeds.
Talking is like playing on the harp; there is as much in laying the hands on the strings to stop their vibration as in twanging them to bring out their music.
If you are still talking about what you did yesterday, you haven't done much today.
A child seldom needs a good talking to as a good listening to.
Trust your intuition. It's your soul talking to you
Wisdom comes with talking less frivolously and listening more seriously. The latter implies a learning attitude; the former assumes an air of omniscience that does not exist.
When the sweet talkin's done, a man is a two face, a worrisome thing who'll leave you to sing the blues in the night.
You talk when you cease to be at peace with your thoughts.
The time to stop talking is when the other person nods his head affirmatively, but says nothing.
When a man gets talking about himself, he seldom fails to be eloquent and often reaches the sublime.
I like to do all the talking myself. It saves time, and prevents arguments.
Talking much about oneself can also be a means to conceal oneself.
Talking about our problems is our greatest addiction. Break the habit. Talk about your joys.
One person's disaster is another person's talking point.
If you can't add to the discussion, don't subtract by talking.
If you think communication is all talking, you haven't been listening.
I love talking about nothing. It is the only thing I know anything about.
I've always believed that a lot of the trouble in the world would disappear if we were talking to each other instead of about each other.
When you don't know what you're talking about, it's hard to know when you're finished.
As great minds have the faculty of saying a great deal in a few words, so lesser minds have a talent of talking much, and saying nothing.
To communicate through silence is a link between the thoughts of man.
If you talk to a man in a language he understands, that goes to his head. If you talk to him in his language, that goes to his heart.
Much talking is the cause of danger. Silence is the means of avoiding misfortune. The talkative parrot is shut up in a cage. Other birds, without speech, fly freely about.
A psychiatrists is the next man you start talking to after you start talking to yourself.
It is more fun to talk with someone who doesn't use long, difficult words but rather short, easy words like "What about lunch?
Doing leads more surely to talking than talking to doing.
